name: Unseeing Eyes - A short interactive fiction game
name_original: Unseeing Eyes - A short interactive fiction game
description:
This Interactive Fiction Game was created for a module in my MA in Independent Games and Playable Experiences at Goldsmiths University London. 

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

This story follows Yannis and his students as they navigate their way through a dystopian nightmare of a strange teaching system. Explore the narrative and choose from Three different endings.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

I'm still learning a lot about creating video games. It's difficult, and I struggled to correctly import an .INK file into Unity and have it interact with Fungus. Hopefully I can continue to make things, and I'll start to learn how to more efficently create projects. ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Tools Use:

INK Unity integration  

Fungus

Music from: Wo0 - OuterLife album

https://archive.org/details/Wo0-OuterLife/06Outendo.mp3
